### Pre-submission Checklist

- [ ] I have read and followed the [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security Confirmation

By submitting this PR, I confirm that:
- [ ] This contribution is for defensive security purposes only
- [ ] I have not included any malicious code or backdoors
- [ ] I understand this will be open source under MIT license
- [ ] I have the right to contribute this code
